title: Very good
comment: Works almost perfectly with Gelbooru, my main booru site. The only flaw is that the images are blurry when I see them fullscreen.  Great app, keep it up!  Oh, and an option to open booru directly with the app would be nice too, if possible.

title: A Young App Going Through Growing Pains
comment: I personally like this app and I enjoy the idea of having an app that makes browsing boorus on an Android device simple, but right now it is going through instability. As of the date of this review, Nori fails to fully load images from any booru. I can only confirm of this from a Nexus 7: perhaps it works fine with other devices. Nori is a promising app that requires some time to grow into something more solid. I recommend to at least try it out and to track its progress.
Works better since the last update :-D

title: Love this app
comment: But still crashes occasionally.  Suggestion: how about adding favorites and tag saving?
The crashes are probably caused by limited heap size (per-app memory size) on your device. I'll try my best to make more optimisations to the image decoder in the next update.

title: Pls fixed it it still crashing...
comment: It keeps crashing after few minutes of use.. please fix. PLEEAASSEE!!! I'LL GIVE 5 STARS IF IT OTHERWISE. Moreover, it closes itself when i'm the middle of the seeking... i cant also send a crash report becoz of it.
Please try the newest version. I made some major changes to the Bitmap loading code that should fix the crashes once and for all. If it doesn't, please make sure to submit a crash report.

title: Crashes consistently?
comment: The app works perfectly, but after a few minutes of use, images start to load slower and slower and the app eventually crashes. Will submit a crash report and hopefully the problem will be fixed?
Please try the newest version. I made some major changes to the Bitmap loading code that should fix the crashes once and for all. If it doesn't, please make sure to submit a crash report.

title: Good interface but only loads one source
comment: I love the interface and smoothness of the app. Thanks to the awesome and prompt response of the dev the bug that was keeping the app from working for me has been fixed. Excellent app.
It works fine for me. Maybe you should change the safety rating filter setting?
Thanks for your feedback! I made it optional in the latest update.

title: Not usable
comment: Works fine for a few minutes then locks phone up and crashes whole device.  Edit for dev: No, I can't submit a crash report, it locks up the entire device.
That's unusual. Could you submit a crash report?

title: Excellent
comment: I've been trying to pin down a decent Danbooru client for some time now and this app wins the gold. Works excellently, without any major bugs. Support for Sankaku Complex sites would be a plus for me, but in no way dampers this apps credibility. Thank you developer(s)!
